content: I think I'll opt for a more affordable option from Cuisinart or Calphalon. While All-Clad is a great brand, I'm not sure I need the highest-end cookware for my cooking needs. I'm just starting out and want to get a feel for cooking with stainless steel before investing in a more expensive set. Plus, I've heard great things about Cuisinart and Calphalon from friends and online reviews. Do you think I should consider any specific features or sets from these brands?
